resources.string: 1. Taekwondo means:Τhe way of the foot and the hand
2. The principles of Taekwondo are: (5 correct answers)
5. Find the right 3 correct cases of winning:
the land from which the stem of the plant grows
heaven to whom growing the plant converted into tree
One point for punch to the chest
One point for kick in the chest
Three points for rotary kick to the chest
Two points for a kick to the head guard
Four points for rotary kick to the headset
Wow!You Love Taekwondo!!! Your five answers are correct...
I Hope you Loved a little more Taekwondo...your answers are not correct.
Taekwondo means:the way of the foot and the hand.
The principles of Taekwondo are:Politeness,Honesty,Insistence,Self check and Indomitable Spirit.
The right 3 correct cases of winning are: One point for punch to the chest.Three points for rotary kick to the chest.Four points for rotary kick to the headset.
